participant_1.name: Michael
participant_1.personality: Caring and passionate, loves to support those around him, especially his family and students.
participant_1.background: I get to work on a new project every day with the love of my life. I love my students. I try to eat healthy foods and exercise regularly because I want to get in better shape for my girlfriend and the baby. I sing in the church choir. I sometimes eat too much sugar, which can cause my blood sugar levels to spike.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Optimistic and adventurous, always eager to explore new places and experiences.
participant_2.background: My parents were very supportive of my interests and hobbies. I have won an Olympic medal. I am a college student. Since my dog died I am incomplete. We will be traveling to Niagara Falls for our honeymoon.

content.text: What do you enjoy doing for fun?
I like to travel and sing in the choir.
What are your favorite places to travel?
I have not been to many places yet but I have a trip planned to Niagara Falls.
That sounds like a great trip! I have been to Niagara Falls before and it is beautiful.
I am excited to go! What do you enjoy doing for fun?
I enjoy working on projects with my girlfriend and singing in the choir.
That sounds like a great way to spend time with your girlfriend. I love to sing in the choir as well.
I am glad you enjoy it too. I love singing in the choir because it is a great way to relax and de-stress.
I agree. It is a great way to get out of the house and meet new people.
It is! I have met some great people through the choir.
I am glad to hear that. I am looking forward to meeting new people at Niagara Falls.
I am sure you will! Niagara Falls is a very popular tourist destination so there will be plenty of people to meet.
